title: “President never asked me to resign”: PM Rajapaksa
body_lines: Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa says President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has never asked him to vacate his position.
During an audience with the Pradeshiya Sabha chairpersons, mayors and district leaders today (April 27), PM Rajapaksa also expressed confidence that the President would not ask him to do so.
